entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:13 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Rain, -1.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Freezing Rain

Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 5 km
Humidity: 88 %

Dewpoint: -3.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
